ygData.subject: Re: some info
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, try telling a Monk that item is useless :) -Luke ... of a
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, try telling a Monk that item is useless :)

-Luke


At 08:24 PM 9/10/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>
>
>Yes, his information is correct. I'm just confused as to how a container
>that reduces the weight of all items to zero could be considered useless????
>Not worth 6000pp perhaps, but useless?? If you ever come into possession
of a
>useless item like this (there are a number of weight reducing containers in
>the game), let me know and I'll be happy to take it off your hands :)
>
>
>
>Eron Linver wrote:
>
>> From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
>>
>> Are you sure of this?? Where did you hear this from. I don't want to blow
>> 6000 PP on something to find out it is useless.
>>
>> mstokes wrote:
>>
>> >
>> > Nope its just a container which reduces the wieght of all items to zero.
>>
>> --Eron
>> aeron@...
